title: 820-00281 When it goes to sleep, the LCD is off.
message:
The title is unclear, bad translation I suppose.
The LCD MUST go off in sleep.
Do you want to say there is a problem when machine wakes from sleep?
Captured screenshots appear after comes back from sleep, or what?

title: 820-00281 When it goes to sleep, the LCD is off.
message: When you lower the Mac's screen and lift it up, it shows no image.

title: 820-00281 When it goes to sleep, the LCD is off.
message:
Check security settings and allow machine tyo boot from USB.
Then see what happens booting known good USB macOS.
Is good to discard a software issue.

Check SMC_LID_RIGHT/LEFT_R and SMC_LID signals; when screen goes off.
Do PRAM reset, just in case.
